definition: any of various burrowing animals of the family Leporidae having long ears and short tails
details:
noun
- any of various burrowing animals of the family Leporidae having long ears and short tails
= synonyms: rabbit
- small short-eared burrowing mammal of rocky uplands of Asia and western North America
= synonyms: pika, mouse hare, rock rabbit, coney
- any of several small ungulate mammals of Africa and Asia with rodent-like incisors and feet with hooflike toes
= synonyms: coney
